com.kaichunlin.transition

Class TransitionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kaichunlin.transition.internal.TransitionControllerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class TransitionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Manages the transition state of a set of ITransitionController

    Created by Kai-Chun Lin on 2015/4/14.
